name: Auto Cast
description:
Spells

Unlock and master various self casting spells with unique talents and masteries to slay the horde of never ending enemies!

Bosses

If the hordes weren’t enough, your increase in power attracts formidable foes. These bosses will way the hero down with powerful debuffs, dispatch them quickly, before you become overwhelmed.

Items

In efforts to aid your journey, chests with build defining items have been scattered across the lands. Anvils can also be found and used to forge ancient relics, which can be activated for boosts in power.

Talents

Defeating bosses garners the attention of Soul Forgers who will mend the hero’s fragmented soul and grant boons, but beware, the being that stole it in the first place still roams the lands.

Unlocks

Failure is still progress towards success. Unlock new spells, items, and more as you gain prestige. Coins can also be spent in the shop to boost the hero’s power, or to further line your pockets.


Can you make it past level 35?
